terms.title: Booking Conditions
terms.intro: These Booking Conditions regulate the contracting of services offered by Dolovibes S de RL, operating as Dolo Vibes.
terms.acceptance: By making a reservation, the client accepts these conditions.
terms.questionsDesc: If you have questions about our booking conditions, don't hesitate to contact us.

content.desc: A person who contracts the services offered by the Company.
Hiking, trekking, accommodation, and related activity packages.
Independent third parties that directly provide services such as accommodation, guides, or transportation.

sections.title: Object of the Contract
sections.text: The Company acts as an organizer of tourist experiences and service intermediary, managing the contracting of local providers for the provision of services included in each package.

sections.title: Booking Process
bullets: The reservation is considered provisional until the corresponding deposit payment is received.
Once the initial payment is received, the Company will send written confirmation to the client.
The Company reserves the right to reject a reservation if there is no availability with providers.

subsections.subtitle: 4.1 Deposit
subsections.text: A minimum payment of 50% of the total package price is required to confirm the reservation.

subsections.subtitle: 4.2 Final Payment
subsections.text: 100% of the amount must be paid no later than 45 days before the start of the trip. Detailed information about hotels, refuges, and final logistics will be provided only after full payment is received.

subsections.subtitle: 4.3 Non-Payment
subsections.text: If the client does not make the final payment within the indicated period, the Company may cancel the reservation without the right to a deposit refund.

sections.title: Prices
sections.text: Prices are quoted in euros and are subject to:
sections.note: The Company reserves the right to adjust prices before final confirmation.

sections.title: Itinerary Changes
sections.text: The Company may modify routes, accommodations, or activities for reasons of:
sections.note: Similar alternatives will be offered whenever possible, without automatic refunds.

sections.title: Cancellations by the Client
sections.text: Cancellation policies depend on the providers involved. Generally:
bullets: Cancellations more than 45 days in advance: partial refund based on costs already incurred
sections.warning: Some services may be 100% non-refundable from the time of booking.

sections.title: Cancellations by the Company
sections.text: The Company may cancel the trip due to force majeure, lack of minimum participants, or operational impossibility. In these cases, the client may choose:
bullets: Partial or full refund, according to costs already committed to providers

sections.title: Reservation Transfer
sections.text: The client may transfer their reservation to another person, provided that:
bullets: They meet the physical requirements of the tour
Notification is given in writing with at least 45 days notice

sections.title: Client Obligations
sections.warning: Non-compliance may result in exclusion from the activity without the right to a refund.

sections.title: Self-Guided Tours
sections.text: In self-guided tours, the client accepts that:
bullets: They will not have guide accompaniment during routes
They are responsible for assessing safety conditions
They must follow the general instructions provided
sections.note: The Company is not responsible for incidents during unguided routes.

sections.title: Provider Responsibility
sections.text: Local providers are directly responsible for the proper provision of their services. The Company is not responsible for acts or omissions of said providers, although it will support the client in managing solutions when possible.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.text: The Company's liability is limited to the amount paid by the client for the contracted services, except in cases of proven gross negligence.

sections.title: Travel Insurance
sections.text: The client is responsible for purchasing travel insurance that covers:
sections.warning: Insurance is not included in our packages.

sections.title: Applicable Law
sections.text: This contract is governed by the laws of the United Mexican States. Activities carried out abroad are also subject to the local regulations of the country where they take place.

sections.title: Acceptance
sections.text: Payment of the deposit or full amount implies express acceptance of these Booking Conditions.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellation.intro: Cancellation policies vary depending on the package and providers involved, as we work with hotels, refuges, and local guides that have their own policies.
cancellation.moreThan45: Cancellations more than 45 days before the trip starts:
cancellation.moreThan45Desc: Partial refund, deducting administrative costs and already booked services.
cancellation.lessThan45: Cancellations less than 45 days before the trip:
cancellation.nonRefundable: Some services may be 100% non-refundable from the moment of booking, especially during high season or for specific accommodations.
cancellation.companyTitle: Cancellations or changes by the Company
cancellation.companyIntro: The Company may modify or cancel the itinerary due to:
cancellation.clientOptions: In these cases, the client may choose to:
options: Receive credit for a future trip
Partial or full refund, depending on costs already committed to providers
cancellation.noShowDesc: If the client does not show up at the agreed place and date, it will be considered a late cancellation and there will be no right to a refund.
cancellation.refundsDesc: Refunds, when applicable, will be made through the same payment method used, within a period of 15 to 30 business days, depending on the payment platform.
cancellation.importantNoteDesc: The specific policies of each package are detailed during the booking process and are part of the Booking Conditions accepted by the client when contracting.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to improve the user experience.
cookies.whatDesc: Cookies are small files that are stored on your device when you visit a website and allow your browser to be recognized.
cookies.necessaryDesc: Enable basic site functionality, such as access to secure areas and the booking process.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how users interact with the site to improve our services (e.g., Google Analytics).
cookies.marketingDesc: Used to display relevant advertising on external platforms.
cookies.managementDesc1: The user can accept, reject or configure the use of cookies from the cookie banner when entering the site.
cookies.managementDesc2: You can also delete cookies from your browser settings.
cookies.changesDesc: This policy may be updated at any time. Changes will be published on this page.
